IncrementalAnytimeExactBeliefPropagation.Model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • IncrementalAnytimeExactBeliefPropagation.Model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a model of a factor graph that is incrementally explored. It contains a graphicalModel as an attribute, which represents the entire graph and remains unchanged during the inference process. It also contains a exploredGraphicalModel attribute, that stores the part of the graph seen so far. The inference (done by the BeliefPropagationWithConditioning class) is always done over the partial graph, which is then expanded through the method ExpandModel.
    Author:
    ferreira

    • Method Detail

      • ExpandModel

        public void ExpandModel(java.util.Iterator<FactorNode> it)
        This method receives as input an Iterator<FactorNode> object and expands the exploredGraphicalModel by adding ONE FACTOR to it. There are various ways of doing such expansion, and it is then given to the User the choice on which way to go.
        Parameters:
        it -

      • isExhausted

        public boolean isExhausted(VariableNode variable)
        A VariableNode is said to be exhausted if and only if all the factors directly linked to it are present in the exploredGraphicalModel. This means that there is no information directly related to it that we do not know already.
        Parameters:
        variable -
        Returns:
